name: Area Fifty-Run
description:
The day is September 20th. Nevada James and Arizona Joy have successfully broken into Area 51. Inside, they discovered a beacon that would allow whoever activated it to be sent into space. Unfortunately, the beacon can only be used on one person, and the moment it’s removed from its pedestal, Area 51 will begin to go into lockdown. Nevada James and Arizona Joy must escape Area 51, meanwhile competing for possession of the beacon.

Team:

O-Sky Lochmandy - Music & Art

Blake Lochmandy - Art

Jonathan Curras - Programming
